name: Eiffel Tower
description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.
address: Champ de Mars, 5 Av. Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

name: Lourve Museum
description: The Louvre, or the Louvre Museum, is a national art museum in Paris, France, containing iconic masterpieces such as the Mona Lisa.

name: Arc De Triomphe
description: The Arc de Triomphe de l'Étoile is one of the most famous monuments in Paris, France.
address: Pl. Charles de Gaulle, 75008 Paris, France

name: Musée d'Orsay
description: The Musée d'Orsay is a museum in Paris, France, on the Left Bank of the Seine.
address: Esplanade Valéry Giscard d'Estaing, 75007 Paris, France

name: Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris
description: Notre-Dame de Paris, referred to simply as Notre-Dame, is a medieval Catholic cathedral on the Île de la Cité, in the 4th arrondissement of Paris, France.
address: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, 75004 Paris, France
